title: srI satya nArAyaNam upAsmahE
sahitya:
shrI satya nArAyaNam upAsmahE nityam
 satya jnAnAnanda-mayam sarvam viSNumayam 
 (shrI)
 
anupallavi

 vAsavAdi pUjitam vara muni gaNa bhAvitam
 dAsa jana paripAlitam bhAsamAna badarIsthitam 
 (shrI)

caraNam

 vaishya jAti kAraNam vaTu vESa dhAriNam
 kaliyuga prasannam vasu pradAna nipuNam


 madhyama kaalam

 matsya kUrma varAhAdi dashAvatAra prabhAvam
 shaNkha cakrAbja hastam guruguha nuta prasiddham
 (shrI)
